Detailed Description

template<class DataType>
class DzTSharedPointer< DataType >

A template class for implementing a shared pointer.

This pointer class is for classes that implement their own reference counting - i.e. ref() and unref() methods - this class does the rest.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class DataType>
DzTSharedPointer< DataType >::DzTSharedPointer (  )  [inline]

Default Constructor. Creates a new instance of the shared item.

template<class DataType>
DzTSharedPointer< DataType >::DzTSharedPointer ( DataType *  ptr  )  [inline]

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts. Creates a pointer referencing the given object.

template<class DataType>
bool DzTSharedPointer< DataType >::isUnique (  )  [inline]
Returns:
True if the object referenced by this pointer has a reference count of 1. Also returns true if this pointer is NULL.
